Text:
check out this torrent it's works perfectly Xilisoft Video Converter Ultimate 6.5.8.0531 (lastest)
Link
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6453441/Xilisoft_Video_Converter_Ultimate_6.5.8.0531___serial_-_TEAM_BA_

This worked for me, after the one I was using became disabled.  I did not think to uncheck the automatic updates.  It seems like the folks at Xilisoft get wise to pirated copies and can disable them after they've been so-called registered.  Before installing this, I would recommend uninstalling any prior version as well as removing all references to it in the registry.  My computer had 4 or 5 references, at least two of which were folders in the registry, which I deleted.  This version then worked fine.  Be sure to uncheck the auto updates in the preferences right away.

Thanks to SoulUpdater for sharing this.
